Item.value: 1. To Approve DCR - 'Approve DCR' 2.To Send to Lead Design (Rnd) -'Reject - Send to Lead RnD' 3. To Cancel DCR- 'Cancel DCR'
1. To Send to Lead PE n CS 'Approve - Send to Lead PE n CS' 2.To Send to Lead Design (Rnd) -'Reject - Send to Lead Design (RnD)' 3. To Cancel DCR- 'Cancel DCR'
1. To Send to Lead Rnd 'Approve - Send to Lead RnD' 2.To Send to Lead Reviewer - ' Reject - Send to Procurement Head' 3. To Assign Approved DCR to Designer - 'Assign Approved DCR to Designer'
Assign Lead Design From RnD For Review
1. To Send to Lead Design RnD -'Approve - Send to Lead Design RnD' 2. To Send to Initiator - 'Reject - Send to SQE Lead'
1. To Send to Procurement Head -'Approve - Send to Procurement Head' 2. To Send to Initiator - 'Reject - Send to Initiator'
